resources.string: An exceptional example of elven craftsmanship. It\'s clearly more effective and accurate than regular wooden bow.
A small filthy piece of flesh and fur. Are those can actually be of use to someone?
This hunch man is completely covered in leather. He strongly smells of medications and... garlic?
One of the locals. Even though this is clearly a commoner, those clothes does look expensive
Do you know about that special service the \"movie theatre\" provides? Too bad they ask for some exotic thing called \"Internet\", I never even heard about it."
I am sorry, you cannot use our service right now. (Internet connection required)
